tool_description: Calculates US Treasury Series I Bond Values.
name: Series I Bond Calculator
title: Series I Bond Calculator

api_list.name: Series I Bond Value
api_list.description:
Get the value of an IBond based on the purchase date, sell date, and bond amount. 

Returns both the actual value and the penalized value (if owned for less than 5 years)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://series-i-bond-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "series-i-bond-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://series-i-bond-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "series-i-bond-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
